p: As shown in Fig 1, a total of 3,156 individuals seeking HIV counseling and testing services at selected CBOs in the 16 cities were screened for study participation. Among those screened, 12 failed to meet inclusion criteria and 9 were excluded due to known HIV-positive serostatus. Thus, a total of 3,135 (99.3%) enrolled in the study, and all completed the questionnaire and HIV testing.
